#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define gc getchar()
#define MOD 1000000007
inline void read(long long *l){
	*l=0;
	char ch=gc;
	while(ch<'0'||ch>'9') ch=gc;
	while(ch>='0'&&ch<='9'){
		*l=(*l)*10+ch-'0';
		ch=gc;
	}
}
int main()
{
	
	while(1)
	{
		char a[502],b[502];
		scanf("%s",a);
		if(a[0]=='0')
			break;
		long long int ans=0,i=0,j,l=0,d;
		j=strlen(a);
		while(a[i]!='\0')
		{
			if(a[i]=='+'||a[i]=='-'||a[i]=='*'||a[i]=='/')
			{
				b[l]=a[i];
				l++;
			}
			i++;
		}
		read(&ans);
		for(i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			read(&d);
				if(b[i]=='+')
					ans=(ans+d)%MOD;
				else if(b[i]=='-')
					ans=(ans-d)%MOD;
				else if(b[i]=='*')
					ans=(ans*d)%MOD;
				else if(b[i]=='/')
					ans=(ans/d)%MOD;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
